content: **knitted blanket for babies with zig-zag pattern in drops fabel ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fa-042-by yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** width 52-64 cm length 52-80 cm **yarn** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100 g colour 100 off white 100-100 g colour 921 unicorn party **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge** 28 stitches in width and 32 row in height with a 2 = 10 x 10 cm 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
